name: dat2latex
tagline: This is a little bash script to convert a .dat file in a .tex file containing the data in a table.
body:
### Welcome to dat2LaTeX.sh webpage.
This is a little bash script to convert a text-only .dat file into a .tex table.

You can type:

```
$ dat2LaTeX.sh
```
or
```
$ dat2LaTeX.sh -h
```

to read a little help to use this script properly.

Enjoy LaTeX!
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
